# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Head of Security
The Head of Security is the head of the Security department. They are expected to oversee the department, and ensure that the security is effective.
## Do - Ensure the department is running smoothly. - Ensure the officers are doing their jobs to the letter of the Law. - Be prepared to respond to a station-wide threat and arm the officers; even other crew if necessary. - Look cool in that uniform.
